entry.value: SELECT P.Purposes_ShortName Scenario, P.Purposes_Name, K.DealIdFO, K.BODeal_Id, D.Comments KtpComment, S.Securities_Id, S.Securities_Name, S.Securities_ShortName, S.SecuritiesType, E.Validated, E.EventDate, E.InternalStatus, ES.Event_Id, ES.Folders_Id, ES.Currencies_Id, ES.TradeDate, ES.ValueDate, ES.BuySell, ES.Quantity, ES.Principal, ES.Price, ES.NetPrice, ED.PositionKey_Id, ED.PositionStatus, ED.PositionDate, ED.ReversalDate, C.PositionCfg_Id, C.PositionCfg_Name, C.Entity_Id, C.PositionLevel, C.ChartOfAccount_Id, C.AccountingGroup_Id, C.AccGrpInventoryLevel, C.FoldersGrp_Id, C.FolGrpInventoryLevel, C.InventoryMethod, C.RevaluationType, C.AccountingRevalMethod, C.AllowProvisions, C.PositionDate PositionDateCfg, C.SortingCriteria, C.OpenSenseSorting, C.ReversalProcess, C.EndOfDay, C.AccountingMethod, C.ResetAccruedAcquired, C.LongPositionRevalPrice, C.ShortPositionRevalPrice, C.PositionSense, C.UseNativeDeal, C.UseExternalDeal, C.CollatAccMethod, C.UnsettledDeal

FROM kplustp..EventPositionStatus ED, kplustp..Event E, kplustp..EventSecurities ES, kplustp..Securities S, kplustp..BODeal BO, kplustp..PositionKey Y, kplustp..PositionCfg C, KplusLocal1..EquitiesDeals D, kplustp..BODealFOKey K, KplusLocal1..Folders F, KplusLocal1..Purposes P

WHERE ED.Event_Id = E.Event_Id AND E.BODeal_Id = BO.BODeal_Id AND K.BODeal_Id = BO.BODeal_Id AND D.EquitiesDeals_Id = K.DealIdFO AND D.Purposes_Id = P.Purposes_Id AND D.Folders_Id = F.Folders_Id AND ES.Event_Id = E.Event_Id AND E.Securities_Id = S.Securities_Id AND ED.PositionKey_Id = Y.PositionKey_Id AND Y.PositionCfg_Id = C.PositionCfg_Id AND S.Validity = 'A' AND C.InventoryMethod = 'R' AND C.PositionDate = 'V'
AND K.KdbTables_Id IN (SELECT KdbTables_Id FROM KplusLocal1..KdbTables WHERE KdbTables_Name = ':typeofdeal')
